so_7104138: #!/bin/sh
#find "$1" -name '* *' |  # Edited as per OP's request
find . -type f -name '* *' |
while read -r filename; do
    case `file -i "$filename" -F "::"` in
        *::" audio"/*) echo "$filename" | tr '\012' '\000' ;;
    esac
done |
xargs -0 audacious2 -p &
